Magnetic Fields and Forces.title: Analyzing the Earth’s Magnetosphere
Magnetic Fields and Forces.description:
Explain the solar wind interaction and magnetosphere formation. Discuss protective effects on Earth’s atmosphere and implications for life.

**Task:** Diagram Earth’s magnetosphere and explain particle deflection paths clearly.

Magnetic Fields and Forces.title: Magnetic Torque on Satellites (Attitude Control Systems)
Magnetic Fields and Forces.description:
Investigate how spacecraft use magnetorquers to adjust orientation.

**Task:** Explain how torque is generated using Earth’s magnetic field, illustrating clearly with diagrams.

Magnetic Fields and Forces.title: Particle Accelerators and Magnetic Fields
Magnetic Fields and Forces.description:
Describe how magnetic fields steer charged particle beams in cyclotrons or synchrotrons.

**Task:** Explain with diagrams why magnetic fields affect direction, but not speed.

Magnetic Fields and Forces.title: Radiation Belts (Van Allen Belts)
Magnetic Fields and Forces.description:
Discuss the formation, stability, and hazard posed by Earth’s radiation belts.

**Task:** Clearly explain how Earth’s magnetic field traps charged particles, including diagrams.

Magnetic Fields and Forces.title: Medical Application: Proton Therapy (Magnetic Steering)
Magnetic Fields and Forces.description:
Explain how magnets precisely steer proton beams to treat tumors.

**Task:** Discuss physics principles involved; include conceptual diagrams or animations.
